titleStmt.title: The great mystery of providence, or, The various methods of God in ordering and over-ruling the actions of wicked men and devils to great and glorious purposes with the vindication of his holiness therein : being the substance of several sermons / preached by George Gifford.
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
